title: com.apple.Safari
description: General Settings for the Safari Web Browser

AutoOpenSafeDownloads.title: Auto open safe downloads
AutoOpenSafeDownloads.description: Enables the opening of certain file types automatically using the default application for that file type

DownloadsPath.title: Downloads Path
DownloadsPath.description: Path to where downloads are kept

HomePage.title: Home Page
HomePage.description: Set the default page for new browser windows

ReadingListSaveArticlesOfflineAutomatica.title: Save Reading Lost Articles for Offline Reading
ReadingListSaveArticlesOfflineAutomatica.description: Enables offline caching of articles saved to the reading list

CanPromptForPushNotifications.title: Allow Web Sites to Prompt User to Allow Push Notifications
CanPromptForPushNotifications.description: Allow Web Sites to Prompt User to Allow Push Notifications

AskBeforeSubmittingInsecureForms.title: Enable Ask Before Submitting Insecure Forms
AskBeforeSubmittingInsecureForms.description: Prompts the user to confirm insecure form submissions

PrintHeadersAndFooters.title: Enable Printing of Header and Footer
PrintHeadersAndFooters.description: Enable Printing of Header and Footer

ShowFavoritesBar.title: Show Favorites Bar
ShowFavoritesBar.description: Shows the Favorites bar if set to true

ShowIconsInTabs.title: Show Icons in Tabs
ShowIconsInTabs.description: Sets whether to show website favicons in tabs

ShowSidebarInNewWindows.title: Show Sidebar in New Windows
ShowSidebarInNewWindows.description: Sets whether to show the sidebar in new browser windows

ShowSidebarInTopSites.title: Show Sidebar in Top Sites
ShowSidebarInTopSites.description: Sets whether to show the sidebar in Top Sites

WarnAboutFraudulentWebsites.title: Warn about Fraudulent Websites
WarnAboutFraudulentWebsites.description: Sets whether to warn the user about fraudulent websites

WebAutomaticSpellingCorrectionEnabled.title: Automatic Spell Correction Enabled
WebAutomaticSpellingCorrectionEnabled.description: Sets whether to enable automatic spelling correction

WebContinuousSpellCheckingEnabled.title: Continuous Spell Checking Enabled
WebContinuousSpellCheckingEnabled.description: Sets whether to enable continuous spell checking

WebKitMinimumFontSize.title: Minimum Font Size
WebKitMinimumFontSize.description: Sets the minimum font size for web pages

WebKitPreferences.aggressiveTileRetentio.title: Enable Aggressive Tile Retention
WebKitPreferences.aggressiveTileRetentio.description: Sets whether to enable aggressive tile retention

WebKitPreferences.allowsPictureInPicture.title: Enable Picture in Picture Playback
WebKitPreferences.allowsPictureInPicture.description: Sets whether to enable Picture in Picture playback of video

WebKitPreferences.backspaceKeyNavigation.title: Enable Backspace Key Navigation
WebKitPreferences.backspaceKeyNavigation.description: Sets whether to enable backspace key navigation

WebKitPreferences.dnsPrefetchingEnabled.title: Enable DNS Prefetching
WebKitPreferences.dnsPrefetchingEnabled.description: Sets whether to enabld DNS prefetching

WebKitPreferences.fullScreenEnabled.title: Enable Full Screen
WebKitPreferences.fullScreenEnabled.description: Sets whether full screen is allowed to be set

WebKitPreferences.invisibleMediaAutoplay.title: Enable autoplay of hidden content
WebKitPreferences.invisibleMediaAutoplay.description: Sets whether hidden content can be autoplayed

WebKitPreferences.javaScriptCanOpenWindo.title: Allow Javascript to automatically Open Windows
WebKitPreferences.javaScriptCanOpenWindo.description: Allows popup windows to be instantiated via Javascript

WebKitPreferences.mediaDevicesEnabled.title: Enable Media Devices
WebKitPreferences.mediaDevicesEnabled.description: Sets whether media devices are enabled

WebKitPreferences.showsToolTipOverTrunca.title: Enable Tooltips over Truncated Text
WebKitPreferences.showsToolTipOverTrunca.description: Sets whether to show tooltips over truncated text

WebKitPreferences.telephoneNumberDetecti.title: Enable Telephone Number Detection
WebKitPreferences.telephoneNumberDetecti.description: Sets whether telephone number detection is enabled

WebKitPreferences.usesPageCache.title: Use Page Cache when Available
WebKitPreferences.usesPageCache.description: Sets whether to use cached page content
